title: Design Consultation
desc: We are a design oriented firm and provide site measurements, initial design and consultation services.
long_desc: We are a design oriented firm and provide site measurements, initial design and consultation services. Rest assured, you will leave our meetings with a well thought-out design and everything on your mind for your new kitchen!

title: Kitchens
desc: At Trade Standards our passion is building enviable kitchens for your home and family and hiring the best company you can find is important.
long_desc: At Trade Standards our passion is building enviable kitchens for your home and family. No matter if the reason for a kitchen renovation is our of necessity or the need for a change, it’s a valuable add-on to pursue, and hiring the best company you can find is important.

title: Bathrooms
desc: Our company has had the pleasure of creating many successful bathroom facelifts and full remodels over the years.

title: Full Remodeling
desc: Kitchens and bathrooms need to be functional above all else, but that doesn’t mean they can’t look nice while they’re at it.
long_desc: Kitchens and bathrooms need to be functional above all else, but that doesn’t mean they can’t look nice while they’re at it. We are proud to provide full-service remodeling specializing in absolutely everything to make these rooms look their best.
